title: Prevalence of low back pain and associated factors among nurses working in public hospitals of Hawassa city, southern Ethiopia: A cross-sectional study
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Debora Banga, Tinbete Samuel, Manaye Yihune, Gezahegn Bekele, Ezedin Molla, Yacob Abraham Borie, Ayantu Melese, Ayele Agena, Tomas Yeheyis
